DataElement.preferredName: Right Palmar Region Plaque Body Surface Area Importance Weight Product Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calculated value representing the weighted plaque score multiplied by the area score for plaque occurring in the palm of the right hand.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Right Palmar Region Plaque Body Surface Area Importance Weight Product
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north._The undersurface of the hand._Abnormal tissue that results from the progressive accumulation or deposit of certain substances in a body cavity, surface, or lumen._A measure of the 2-dimensional extent of the body surface (i.e., the skin). Body surface area (BSA) can be calculated by mathematical formula or from a chart that relates height to weight. BSA is often an important factor in dosing._The relative importance granted to something._A quantity obtained by multiplication.

Concepts.definition: A measure of the 2-dimensional extent of the body surface (i.e., the skin).  Body surface area (BSA) can be calculated by mathematical formula or from a chart that relates height to weight.  BSA is often an important factor in dosing.
The relative importance granted to something.
